projects.title: Survivors of the Titanic
projects.description: The Python programming language and the TensorFlow Decision Forests (TF-DF) library are used to train a Gradient Boosted Trees (GBT) model using the Titanic training data. Pre-processing of the data and tokenization of passenger names is performed to improve the accuracy of the model.

projects.title: Restaurant Revenue
projects.description: Restaurant Revenue Prediction This project aims to predict the revenue of restaurants using regression models. The dataset used in this project is the 'Restaurant Revenue Prediction' dataset from Kaggle.
